vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.rate (local variable @ TimedCrowdsale.sol#404) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (function @ TimedCrowdsale.sol#441-443)

Crowdsale.constructor.token (local variable @ TimedCrowdsale.sol#404) shadows:

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor.openingTime (local variable @ TimedCrowdsale.sol#583) shadows:
	- TimedCrowdsale.openingTime (function @ TimedCrowdsale.sol#596-598)

vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor.closingTime (local variable @ TimedCrowdsale.sol#583) shadows:

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (TimedCrowdsale.sol#583-591) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(openingTime >= block.timestamp,TimedCrowdsale: opening time is before current time) (TimedCrowdsale.sol#585)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (TimedCrowdsale.sol#610-613) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (TimedCrowdsale.sol#612)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (TimedCrowdsale.sol#619-622) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (TimedCrowdsale.sol#621)

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
Address.isContract uses assembly (TimedCrowdsale.sol#208-221)
	- TimedCrowdsale.sol#219
